entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 9.
